alert.note: Alert for Pickaway; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:31PM EDT until July 17 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN PICKAWAY AND NORTHEASTERN ROSS COUNTIES... At 531 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Williamsport, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Circleville, Kingston, Logan Elm Village, Frankfort, Clarksburg, Aw Marion State Park, Pickaway County Airport, State Route 138 at US Route 22 and Andersonville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
